SEARCH
Package CAMSv2

Class SuggestionManager

java.lang.Object
CAMSv2.SuggestionManager
public class SuggestionManager extends Object
Singleton SuggestionManager class responsible for managing Suggestion utility methods.

    • createSuggestion

      public void createSuggestion(Advice advice, Camp camp, String studentName)
      Creates a new suggestion for a given camp, associating it with a student's name.
      Parameters:
      advice - The Advice created in the CCM.
      camp - The camp the advice is to be created in.
      name - The name of the student making the suggestion.

    • viewSuggestionForStaff

      public void viewSuggestionForStaff(String campName, String staffName)
      Allows staff members to view suggestions for a specific camp.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      staffName - The name of the staff member.

    • approveAdvice

      public Suggestion approveAdvice(String campName, String staffName)
      Allows staff members to approve an advice associated with a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp.
      staffName - The name of the staff member.
      Returns:
      The approved suggestion.

      committeeMemberName - The name of the committee member.
      campName - The name of the camp.
